target_text: "To achieve that we need a robust software development process that is subjected to continuous review and improvements."

Codebook.Definition: Refers to the structured approach taken to create software, encompassing planning, design, coding, testing, and maintenance.
The ongoing evaluation of the software development process to identify areas for improvement and ensure quality.
Changes or enhancements made to the software development process aimed at increasing efficiency, effectiveness, or quality.
The quality of being strong and effective in the software development process, ensuring reliability and resilience.
